item.title: Projects
item.description: Longitudinal Projects 高维异常数据下两类支持向量机的统计理论与算法研究国家自然科学基金 · 青年项目 (编号：12401664)，2025.01-2027.12 主持，在研 高维复杂数据下半监督支持向量学习的理论和应用研究重庆市自然科学基金 · 面上项目 (编号：CSTB2024NSCQ-MSX0855)，2024.07-2027.06 主持，在研 复杂金融市场的稀疏稳健机器学习与风险对冲研究重庆市教委科技 · 青年项目 (编号：KJQN202400514)，2024.10-2027.09 主持，在研 稀疏稳健分类模型的正则化理论和应用研究重庆师范大学 · 博士启动基金项目 (编号：23XLB020)，2023.10-2025.10 主持，已结题 Transverse project 仁怀产区大曲酱香型年份白酒数据分析究仁怀酱香白酒科研所，2024.02-2026.12 参与，在研

item.title: Publications
item.description: Selected papers Elastic net nonparallel hyperplane support vector machine and its geometrical rationality Kai Qi, Hu Yang*. IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems, 2022, 33(12): 7199-7209. A new adaptive weighted imbalanced data classifier via improved support vector machines with high-dimension nature Kai Qi, Hu Yang*, Qingyu Hu, Dongjun Yang. Knowledge-Based Systems, 2019, 185: 104933. Full list Fused robust geometric nonparallel hyperplane support vector machine for pattern classification Ruiyao Gao, Kai Qi, Hu Yang*.

item.title: Talks
item.description: Capped asymmetric elastic net support vector machine for robust binary classification ICSA 2023 China Conference (2023)，oral report Chengdu · China Joint rescaled asymmetric least squared nonparallel support vector machine with a stochastic quasi-Newton based algorithm (Student best paper) The 8th annual conference of CQSIAM (2022)，oral report Chongqing · China Joint sparse principal component regression with robust property (Student best paper) The 7th annual conference of CQSIAM (2021)，oral report Chongqing · China
